content: yarn and pull strand through the last 10 sts weave in ends wet block finished hat for smooth fabric pom pom it make a pom pom and attach it to the top of the hat i used chunky hand-spun leftovers for an ultra fluffy pom pom watch this westknits video to assist with making a pom pom https //www youtube com/watch v=k4ywu5gt-k4 © 2012 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 3 photography by westknits version 2
